TopicTitle: KSP SpaceX Starship belly flop mission

Articles.Content:
Hey all

Just wanted to share the reproduction of SpaceX's Starship mission, including the bellyflop.
Just in time after the first succesful mission of yesterday night. Congrats SpaceX !

 

Edited May 6, 2021 by MaverickWoe

SN15's flight was NOT the first succesful. For SN8-SN11 landing in one piece would have been just a nice bonus (SN10 does not count cuz it blew up regardless). Also, Starhopper, SN5, and SN6 also were succesful!
